glsa.title: GNU Wget: Password and metadata leak
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in GNU Wget which could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information.

background.p: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols.

description.p: A vulnerability was discovered in GNU Wgetâ€™s file_metadata in xattr.c.

impact.p: A local attacker could obtain sensitive information to include credentials.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
